General.Name: Kps AG
General.Description: KPS AG provides business transformation consulting and process optimization services in retail and consumer goods sectors in Germany and Europe. It offers advisory services on strategic, process, application, and technology issues relating to digital transformation, and supports its customers in rolling out and implementing holistic solutions. The company also sells software licenses, maintenance contracts, and hardware components as a certified systems house and sales partner. KPS AG was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Unterföhring, Germany.

1.Name: Mr. Leonardo  Musso
1.Title: Founder, CEO, MD & Member of Exec. Board
